blog.name: daziechane
blog.title: Field of Dazies
blog.description:
Now that political bots are no longer following, I can go back to a better description.  
I'm a 50 yr old chorus girl w/delusions of mediocrity. Auntie Mame + Phryne Fisher wannabe. If it sparkles or glitters I want it. I know what it means.

summary: Michael Sheen is positively interacting with fan art and fanfic creators on Twitter. He's saying lovely, kind, and supportive...
body:
Michael Sheen is positively interacting with fan art and fanfic creators on Twitter. He’s saying lovely, kind, and supportive things.

It’s breaking my heart for those who’s work has been mocked and derided by the ones who created the original works on which so many, many wonderful things have been based.

I liked Good Omens, but now I stan a real angel.

reblog.comment:

I liked Good Omens, but now I stan a real angel.
trail.content:

I liked Good Omens, but now I stan a real angel.

summary: ...I secretly love the fact that, even though I may have followed a bunch of Good Omens blogs in the past 2 weeks, my dash is...
body: …I secretly love the fact that, even though I may have followed a bunch of Good Omens blogs in the past 2 weeks, my dash is 97% Good Omens/David Tennant/Michael Sheen, because basically, everyone watched this show and fell as madly in love with it (and them) as I did!!

reblog.comment: …I secretly love the fact that, even though I may have followed a bunch of Good Omens blogs in the past 2 weeks, my dash is 97% Good Omens/David Tennant/Michael Sheen, because basically, everyone watched this show and fell as madly in love with it (and them) as I did!!
